headline: Ask HN: What is a good cheap windows-in-the-cloud pay-per-minute option
description:
I’m asking because I’m working on macOS, but every now and then I want to run some software that only works on Windows 10/11.

So I’m thinking if I could just install that software on a cloud PC that I connect to when needed, then I’m in the clear.

I looked at https://shadow.tech and it works well but it’s a bit too pricey for a poor guy like me.

Any suggestions?

headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 什麼是好的便宜的雲中窗按分鐘付費的選擇？
description_zh-Hans:
我问这个问题是因为我在macOS上工作，但偶尔我想运行一些只能在Windows 10/11上运行的软件。

所以我在想，如果我可以把这些软件安装在云PC上，在需要的时候连接到云PC上，那么我就没有问题了。

我看了一下https://shadow.tech，它很好用，但对于我这样的穷人来说，它有点太贵了。

有什么建议？
